sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"纠正，改正"之意。
means: correct ： 指纠正或改正不正确、不真实或有缺点的东西。
rectify ： 正式用词，意义较抽象，侧重指彻底改正偏离子正确标准或规则的东西。
remedy ： 正式用词，通常指在局部范围内进行纠正，尤指对困难或棘手问题的解决。
revise ： 指通过仔细阅读、反复思考后而进行改正、订正或修订，使趋于完善。
amend ： 书面语用词。指进行更正或改变，使之更好，符合更高的要求。

sentence.Network_en: Only an act of Congress could rectify the situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有国会法案才能矫正这种形势。

sentence.Network_en: Please rectify the mistakes in my bill.
sentence.Network_cn: 请改正我账单上的错误.

精字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 精灵〖 goblin〗 精馏〖 rectify〗 精美〖 fine〗.

整流二极体(rectifier diode)只能让电流单向导通，相当于液压系统中的单向阀或是止回阀， 并且具有限制电压、保护电子元件的功能 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French rectifier, from medieval Latin rectificare, from Latin rectus 'right'

entry.def: If you rectify something that is wrong, you change it so that it becomes correct or satisfactory.

example.ex: Only an act of Congress could rectify the situation...
example.tran: 只有国会法案才能矫正这种形势。

example.ex: That mistake could have been rectified within 28 days.
example.tran: 那个错误原本可以在28天内得以纠正。

means.word_mean: 2. reduce to a fine, unmixed, or pure state; separate from extraneous matter or cleanse from impurities;
3. bring, lead, or force to abandon a wrong or evil course of life, conduct, and adopt a right one;

auth_sentence.content: He found means...to rectify their opinion of his conduct.
auth_sentence.res_content: He found means...to rectify their opinion of his conduct.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He found means...to rectify their opinion of his conduct.

auth_sentence.content: It is high time we rectify this broken system.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is high time we rectify this broken system.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is high time we rectify this broken system.

auth_sentence.content: You can neither straighten their noses, nor...rectify their dispositions.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can neither straighten their noses, nor...rectify their dispositions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can neither straighten their noses, nor...rectify their dispositions.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+direct直接的→adj.间接的, 迂回的
di离开+rect正,直→直接离开→径直的→指向，针对→管理，指导
direct直接的+ly表副词→adv.直接地, 立即
correct[v.改正,纠正]+itude状态→纠正后的状态
correct[v.改正,纠正]+ive表名词→n.矫正物, 中和物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 方向, 指导, 趋势
stems_affixes.word_buile: direct直接的;指导;指向+ion动作或状态→n.方向, 指导, 趋势

stems_affixes.value_cn: 主任, 主管, 导演
stems_affixes.word_buile: direct直接的+or人或物器→n.主任, 主管, 导演
rect正,直+angle角→[四个角]都是直角→矩形
rect正,直+itude状态→正直的状态→诚实,正直
di离开+rect正,直→直接离开→径直的→指向，针对→管理，指导
rect正,直+ify……化→使……正直→改正[错误]

sentences.en: Please rectify the mistakes in my bill.
sentences.cn: 请改正我账单上的错误。

jushi.english: Please rectify the mistakes in my bill.
jushi.chinese: 请改正我账单上的错误。
